title: Final Fantasy VII 25th Anniversary Kinda Funny Live Reactions
description:
We lose our minds to the announcements of Crisis Core Rebirth and FInal Fantasy VII Rebirth

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny

Subscribe And Ring The Notification Bell: 
Kinda Funny: http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1
